Changes.LogName: Ace edits to generic marriage dialogue

Entries.Rainy_Night_0: The rain makes it feel like we're all alone.#$e#I'm cold... I think I'll tuck into bed soon.
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: I'm glad you're home. I missed you.
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: Are you done with your work for the day? We could chat or watch TV or something.$h#$e#But if you're tired I understand.
Entries.TwoKids_2: I think %kid2 has your work ethic. No, really, I can tell!$h
Entries.summer_8: Ugh, I was sweating all night in the heat.
Entries.NoBed_3: Where am I supposed to sleep?$s

Changes.LogName: Platonic amulet line

Entries.Good_5: I was just admiring the amulet you gave me... The shell is flawless. It must have cost you a fortune!

Changes.LogName: Platonic bracelet line

Entries.Good_5: I was just admiring the bracelet you gave me... The pattern is beautiful. You clearly put a lot of care into it!

Changes.LogName: Platonic edits to generic marriage dialogue, lowercase term of endearment

Entries.Rainy_Day_0: It's raining outside. Make sure you don't catch cold, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}.#$e#Stay indoors as much as possible.$h#$e#I worry about you sometimes!
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: It's raining! That means we don't have to water the crops today.$h#$e#Nature can be a big help sometimes.#$e#Have you fed the animals yet?
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: What's on your agenda today, @?#$e#I don't want to go outside in this weather... I'll just do some things around the house.#$e#Maybe I'll make something hot for dinner.
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Hi, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}! Smells good, doesn't it? I made you breakfast! [194 195 210 211 216]#$e#You need food to stay energized throughout the day.
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: Good morning, @. Another day of farm chores, huh?#$e#I'll be cheering for you. <$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: *phew*! I just finished my chores. Now we can spend some time together.$h#$e#So, tell me about your day!$h
Entries.Outdoor_2: Hi, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}! If I knew more about farm work I'd help you out more. Sorry!#$e#I'll be thinking of you.$h
Entries.Outdoor_4: Don't overwork yourself, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}.#$e#Make sure and take a break every now and then, or get something to eat.$h
Entries.TwoKids_2: I think %kid2 has your work ethic. No, really, I can tell!$h
Entries.Good_0: It's hard to believe we're {{RelationshipLabel}}...I'm so happy.
Entries.Good_1: You know, I always had a feeling we'd build a life together some day.
Entries.Good_2: Are you enjoying life as {{RelationshipLabel}}, @?#$e#I am.
Entries.Good_4: This place is my home now... I'm happy here.
Entries.Good_8: Don't worry about me... I know you've got a lot of responsibilities outside of the house. I'm fine in here by myself!
Entries.Neutral_0: I hope you don't get bored of me.$s
Entries.Bad_1: *sigh*... Maybe we moved in together too soon.$s
Entries.Bad_5: You used to be so caring... what happened?$s#$e#It feels like I'm not a priority to you anymore.$s
Entries.Bad_7: You used to make time for me... now it feels like you don't even want to be around me.$s
Entries.Bad_9: I wonder if I'd be better off somewhere else.$s
Entries.summer_1: Make sure you don't get a heat stroke, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}.#$e#Drink plenty of water and don't overwork yourself.
Entries.winter_28: Thanks for a great year, @. I'm excited to tackle next year together.$h
Entries.NoBed_3: Where am I supposed to sleep?$s

Entries.NPC.cs.3955: You can't deepen your relationship with {0} this way.
Entries.NPC.cs.3969: {0} doesn't want to make a lifelong commitment with you right now.
Entries.NPC.cs.3972: Oh!! ... #$b#@... I'm sorry, but no. I can't make the kind of commitment you want right now.$s
Entries.Event.cs.1831: And now... It's dark, and I see you talking with a certain young person. They look happy to be with you.
Entries.Event.cs.1832: And now... It's dark, and I see you talking with a certain young person. They look eager to spend time with you.
Entries.Event.cs.1833: And now... It's dark, and I see you talking with a certain young person. They look happy to be with you.
Entries.Event.cs.1834: And now... It's dark, and I see you talking with a certain young person. They look eager to spend time with you.
Entries.Event.cs.1845: Now I see you, middle-aged, relaxing at home by yourself. You seem content.
Entries.Event.cs.1825: Hmm... I see you sitting alone in a plush chair by the fire, surrounded by luxury.
Entries.Event.cs.1826: Ah... It seems more than a few people are better off for having known you. You must have a lot of love in your heart...
Entries.TriedToMarryButKrobus: You can't ask someone to move in with you while living with a housemate.

Changes.LogName: Platonic commitment ceremony dialogue and 'you're already committed' proposal reactions

Entries.Utility.cs.5367: At first, no one knew if @ would fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of Pelican Town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor, on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and %spouse in a lifelong committment to one another.
Entries.Utility.cs.5369: At first, no one knew if @ would fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor, on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and %spouse in lifelong committment to one another.
Entries.Utility.cs.5370: Well, let's get right to it!
Entries.Utility.cs.5371: @... %spouse... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, I now pronounce you {{RelationshipLabel}}!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5373: @... %spouse... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, I now pronounce you {{RelationshipLabel}}!$h

Entries.Utility.cs.5379: As is tradition, you may now seal this binding pact with a symbolic kiss.
Entries.NPC.cs.3965: You just asked someone else to move in with you! Focus on them!$s
Entries.NPC.cs.3966: Aren't you already about to move in with someone? They say three's a crowd.$s
Entries.NPC.cs.3967: Um, aren't you already committed to someone?

Entries.NPC.cs.3966: Aren't you engaged? They say three's a crowd.$s
Entries.NPC.cs.3967: Um, aren't you married? Shouldn't your spouse have some say in who lives with you?
Entries.NPC.cs.3968: Um, aren't you married? Shouldn't your spouse have some say in who lives with you?

Changes.LogName: Generic post-ceremony line for characters without a unique one

Entries.Game1.cs.2782: The ceremony was wonderful, wasn't it?$h#$e#Well, we can't forget about the farm... time to get to work.

Changes.LogName: Changes dialogue at Flower Festival to say dancing can be platonic

Entries.Lewis: If you'd like to dance with the other young people, you'll need to find a partner. It doesn't have to be someone you're romantically interested in.$h
Entries.Demetrius: These springtime dances can be traced back to ancient fertility rituals. Of course, they don't carry the same implications today.#$e#It's still common for romantic couples to dance together, but the same is true of close friends.

Changes.Logname: Bouquet and pendant description edits, Love Letters

Entries.SeaAmulet: @,^I'm going to give you this advice because I like you and I want you to stay in Pelican Town. If there comes a day that you want to ask someone to spend their life with you, you'll need to give them a 'Mermaid's Pendant' or a handmade 'Friendship Bracelet'. Don't worry, everyone in Pelican Town will understand the meaning of your gift. It's an ancient tradition in this region. Good luck! ^   -Lewis[#]About Mermaid's Pendants
Entries.Bouquet: @,^It seems like you're starting to get close with some of the townspeople. If you want to show someone that you're interested in a closer relationship with them, you've got to give them a beautiful flower bouquet. I'm selling them now, so buy them for all your crushes and/or friends! If you want to live with someone someday, this is the first step! ^   -Pierre[#]About Bouquets

Changes.Logname: Bouquet and pendant mail edits, Love Letters

Entries.SeaAmulet: @,^I'm going to give you this advice because I like you and I want you to stay in Pelican Town. If there comes a day that you want to ask someone to spend their life with you, you'll need to give them a 'Mermaid's Pendant' or a handmade 'Friendship Bracelet'. Don't worry, everyone in Pelican Town will understand the meaning of your gift. It's an ancient tradition in this region. Good luck! ^   -Lewis[#]About Mermaid's Pendants
Entries.Bouquet: @,^It seems like you're starting to get close with some of the townspeople. If you want to show someone that you're interested in a closer relationship with them, you've got to write them a heartfelt letter. I'm selling some beautiful envelopes right now, so buy them for all your crushes and/or friends! If you want to live with someone someday, this is the first step! ^   -Pierre[#]About Heartfelt Letters

Entries.Beach_Mariner_PlayerHasItem: Old Mariner: Don't be shy, now. Show that amulet to the one ye want to spend yer life with.
Entries.Beach_Mariner_PlayerNotUpgradedHouse: Old Mariner: I can see that sparkle in yer eye, {0}. There must be someone ye truly love. But I'm afraid ye need a bigger house if ye want to share yer life with them.
Entries.Beach_Mariner_PlayerBuyItem_Question: Old Mariner: I can see it in yer eyes... There be a special someone in yer heart. Just so happens I'm sellin' a 'Mermaid's Pendant'. Give that to the one ye want to spend yer life with, romantic'lly or otherwise. I've been around long enough to know there's more'n one kind of love.
Entries.ManorHouse_DivorceBook_NoSpouse: Pelican Town Marriage Log... After partnering with someone, you may file for separation here. Let's hope that isn't necessary!
Entries.ManorHouse_DivorceBook_Question: File for separation? There is a 50,000g fee.
Entries.ManorHouse_DivorceBook_Cancelled: Your separation request has been cancelled.
Entries.ManorHouse_DivorceBook_Filed: Your separation papers have been filed, but your partner won't know until tomorrow morning. If you change your mind, come back here before night's end.
Entries.WitchHut_EvilShrineCenter: -Dark Shrine of Memory-^The relationship between you and your ex-partners will be wiped from memory. It will be like you've never met.^Make an offering of 30,000g?

Entries.AlreadyDatingBouquet: You already gave a bouquet to {0}.

Changes.Logname: Already gave bouquet edit, Love Letters

Entries.AlreadyDatingBouquet: You already gave a letter to {0}.

Entries.13:
Partnership Guide For Farmers
Before you ask someone to spend their life with you, you'll have to either date them or be close friends with them for a while first. (Ask someone for a closer relationship with a bouquet, available at Pierre's).
 When you're ready to pop the big question, you'll need to give them either a 'Mermaid's Pendant' or a 'Friendship Bracelet' made from just such a pendant. Everyone knows what it means when you present them with one of those.
 It's rumored that on stormy days, the ghost of an old mariner appears in Stardew Valley, clutching a mermaid's pendant.
 If you gave them a pendant, your partner will arrange a wedding or commitment ceremony! Either way, after a few days, they will move in with you. Remember to treat them well... They'll still appreciate gifts!

Partnership Guide For Farmers
Before you ask someone to spend their life with you, you'll have to either date them or be close friends with them for a while first. (Ask someone for a closer relationship with a heartfelt letter; envelopes are available at Pierre's).
 When you're ready to pop the big question, you'll need to give them either a 'Mermaid's Pendant' or a 'Friendship Bracelet' made from just such a pendant. Everyone knows what it means when you present them with one of those.
 It's rumored that on stormy days, the ghost of an old mariner appears in Stardew Valley, clutching a mermaid's pendant.
  If you gave them a pendant, your partner will arrange a wedding or commitment ceremony! Either way, after a few days, they will move in with you. Remember to treat them well... They'll still appreciate gifts!

Entries.fall_Wed8: What's the secret to a lifelong partnership? Well that's quite a question!#$b#Of course, there are countless answers, but the one thing all those answers have in common...#$b#...is that you must love, simply and unceasingly.

Entries.summer_Tue: Hey, Farmer @. Is there anyone in town who you like?#$e#Yeah, like... LIKE like.$h#$e#Did you know some grownups don't ever LIKE like anyone? Miss Penny told me.

Entries.TwoKids_2: #$c .5#Now that we have kids, I feel like I can see further into the future of our life than ever before.#I think %kid2 has your work ethic. No, really, I can tell!$h.

Entries.Town-Fair.2: Goliath: "HEY THERE, KIDDO. I SEE YOU EYEING SOMEONE IMPORTANT TO YOU. YOU CAN'T HIDE THAT FROM ME. I, GOLIATH, SEE ALL. THIS STRENGTH GAME WILL SURELY IMPRESS EM, IF YOU HAVE THE STRENGTH THAT IS! HAHAHA!!"
